Picture Fragment (Replica)
Furniture_spelunker_lithography_description

A reproduction of a picture fragment inscribed with the words of an ancient tribe. Some say that when all the fragments are put together, the resulting image will reveal the true origins of humanity.[#Legal]

La reproduction d'une tablette sur laquelle est inscrit le message d'une tribu antique. On dit que lorsque tous les fragments seront assemblés, l'image reconstituée révélera la véritable origine de l'humanité.[#Legal]

Reproduktion eines Bildfragments mit einer Inschrift eines uralten Stammes. Es heißt, dass das Zusammenfügen aller Fragmente ein Bild ergibt, das Aufschluss über den wahren Ursprung der Menschen gibt.[#Legal]

Riproduzione del frammento di un dipinto che reca incise le parole di un'antica tribù. Si dice che, una volta riuniti tutti i frammenti, l'immagine risultante rivelerà le reali origini dell'umanità.[#Legal]

Reproducción de un fragmento de pintura con una inscripción de una antigua tribu. Hay quien dice que, al reunir todos los fragmentos, la imagen resultante revelará los verdaderos orígenes de la humanidad.[#Legal]
古代の人々が刻んだ石板のかけらの複製品。言い伝えでは、すべての石板を集めると「人類の起源」を知ることができると云う。[#Legal]
고대 사람들이 새긴 석판 조각의 복제품. 전설에 따르면, 모든 석판을 모으면「인류의 기원」을 알 수 있다고 한다. [#Legal]

A reproduction of a picture fragment inscribed with the words of an ancient tribe. Some say that when all the fragments are put together, the resulting image will reveal the true origins of humanity.[#Legal]
古代的人們所篆刻的石版碎片複製品。據傳說收集到所有的石板就可知道「人類的起源」。[#Legal]
古代的人們所篆刻的石版碎片複製品。據傳說收集到所有的石板就可知道「人類的起源」。[#Legal]

A reproduction of a picture fragment inscribed with the words of an ancient tribe. Some say that when all the fragments are put together, the resulting image will reveal the true origins of humanity.[#Legal]
